signIn.title: You are welcome!
signIn.description: Please log in to continue and access your account!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Follow the steps to reset your password

chooseProfile.participantDescription: Access my tickets, request and track cancellations and ticket ownership transfers.
chooseProfile.organizerDescription: Create and manage events, registrations, participants, finances, and all the tools for managing and promoting events on the platform.

changeForgotPassword.title: Set a new password
changeForgotPassword.description: Create a new password and regain access to your account
changeForgotPassword.changedDescription: You can now log in to your account with the new password.

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.description: We have sent a verification code to {{email}}. Please enter the code below to continue.
verifyEmail.cantResend: You can request a new code in {{minutes}}:{{seconds}}
